comment: If you ask a question get ready to feel dumb. She was an awesome teacher though! Pay attention in class ! DO THE HOMWORK! and you will pass. Easy A.

Showed up on first day. Showed up on exam days. Exams are all multiple choice. If you do the homework. You should get an A+ easy. If you can't pass this class, should re-evaluate whether college is right for you.
Take good notes in class, be sure to have a graphing calculator, and you'll be fine :)

MayMester(2 weeks, M-Th, 5 hours each class).3 projects, 4 homeworks. Certainly doable. Worked hard. My final grade was above 89, lower than 90; Rec'd a B. But I was 4 days late with one project and she accepted it anyway so I cannot say she isn't fair. A PhD, very funny and likable. I would take her again and would work even harder on projects.

Prof Patterson's class wasn't too bad, but the homework was way too hard for the class. All the class deals with is how ancient people did math, so the homework was super hard to figure out the answers. Be prepared to work hard for the grade you want.

She wasn't a bad teacher; however, she favored students. And after she told the class we could work together on homework/take home midterm, she counted points off of the students she didn't favor for "copying". This caused me to get a B instead of an A. I won't take her again, for sure.
No attendance. Allows cheat sheets for tests. Good notes. Nice and funny.  TAKE HER!

Very Very helpful. She tries her best to make us understand.Her quizzes and HW are all online. The tests are in class and are Great because they are multiple choice but you have to show work which means that you can get partial credit if you did everything right with just minor mistakes. TAKE HER IF YOU CAN!!

Dr. P is great! She is really personable and has amazing notes. All you have to do is the online homework and study your notes. She does partial grading, so it's easy to make a good grade. She will help you out and makes sure you understand material. highly recommend.
Very good teacher! class is very organized with good notes!

Geometry is not my favorite before, but now I love it. Dr. Patterson make it very interesting. The class is very easy if you come to class otherwise you will lose some points. She is the best Geometry I ever had.....

In general, I like Dr. Patterson.  She was a good professor, and the class was fairly easy.  Students are allowed to work together on projects, and most of them are take-home.  She is moody and, at times, addresses students with an unnecessary air of condescension and sarcasm.

All homework and quizzes are online. Problems she shows you in class are very basic, then the homework is much more difficult. She will make you feel stupid when you ask a question. You learn more from online homework than from her. The plus is that she allows cheat sheet for Exams.

she does not care at all about the students unless you are a favorite.  I was not so when I would ask questions she would act like I was dumb and couldn't believe I was wasting her time.  I would not suggest her to anyone unless you get math easily.  You don't have to go to class which in nice but you have homeowkr like your in highschool again.

She will answer your questions, but plan on her making you feel stupid. Plays favorites with students she likes more. Explains material well, but keeps asking, "Am I going too slow?" Thinks you should already know material. Work ahead of her lectures or you will be lost. She thinks she is brilliant. She was her class valedictorian.

BEST TEACHER AT KSU! I wish she taught more upper level math classes so I could still take her! I took her for math 1101 also and she was just as great! Very relaxed class. Very detailed in all of her notes. Extremely knowledgeable! May seem like she doesn't care about your question but thats just because she has such a laid back personality

Good professor. Gives detailed notes and lots of examples. She allows on page of notes for exams but they are not that easy. She moves through the material quickly and seems a little aggravated when you ask questions. Don't buy the book we never used it..everything is online. Final exam is multiple choice.

Adorable teacher! Easy class, no attendance policy, come and go as you please.  Patterson is very helpful and teaches as slowly or quickly as needed. Cheat sheet for tests, lots of review and bonus points. Everything is online - some shock at first - but not so bad once you are used to it. I would definitely recommend this class!!

she makes you feel dumb for the questions you ask... she doesnt care if you show up or not. she gives lots of extra credit but that because she doesnt teach what is on the tests. and if you dont like mymathlab..your gonna fail

Pretty easy class *IF* you understand college algebra. SHe lets you have a page of notes for every test, AMAZING, got Bs & As on all my test. My only complaint is that she teaches it as if it is so easy. SHe gets annoyed with questions and can make you feel dumb. BUt, overall I would recommend the class.
easy, great personality.  She is willing to answer any questions and to review anything that is hard or confusing. Would definitely recomend her!
